001package ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort.PosterReport;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterPipeline;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
008import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
009import java.time.Duration;
010import java.util.Base64;
011import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.Objects;
015import java.util.Properties;
016import java.util.UUID;
017import java.util.function.Supplier;
018import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.Consumer;
019import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerConfig;
020import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord;
021import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecords;
022import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.KafkaConsumer;
023import org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringDeserializer;
024
025/**
026 * Kafka-backed poster pipeline that consumes TN3270 message pairs and renders poster reports.
027 * <p>Implements the infrastructure side of {@link PosterPipeline} for TN3270. Instances are not
028 * thread-safe; run one pipeline per CLI execution.
029 *
030 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
031 */
032public final class Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline implements PosterPipeline {
033  private final String bootstrapServers;
034  private final Supplier<Consumer<String, String>> consumerSupplier;
035
036  /**
037   * Creates a poster pipeline that consumes TN3270 pair records from Kafka.
038   *
039   * @param bootstrapServers comma-separated Kafka bootstrap servers
040   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code bootstrapServers} is {@code null}
041   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code bootstrapServers} is blank
042   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
043   */
044  public Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline(String bootstrapServers) {
045    this(bootstrapServers, null);
046  }
047
048  Tn3270KafkaPosterPipeline(String bootstrapServers, Supplier<Consumer<String, String>> consumerSupplier) {
049    this.bootstrapServers = Objects.requireNonNull(bootstrapServers, "bootstrapServers").trim();
050    if (this.bootstrapServers.isEmpty()) {
051      throw new IllegalArgumentException("bootstrapServers must not be blank");
052    }
053    this.consumerSupplier = consumerSupplier != null ? consumerSupplier : this::createConsumer;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Identifies the protocol handled by this pipeline.
058   *
059   * @return {@link ProtocolId#TN3270}
060   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
061   */
062  @Override
063  public ProtocolId protocol() {
064    return ProtocolId.TN3270;
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Streams Kafka records and emits formatted TN3270 poster reports via the supplied output port.
069   *
070   * @param config per-protocol configuration; must provide the Kafka input topic
071   * @param decodeMode decode mode controlling payload processing
072   * @param outputPort destination for rendered poster reports
073   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code config} or {@code outputPort} is {@code null}
074   * @throws Exception if Kafka consumption or report rendering fails
075   * @implNote Polls Kafka in 500 ms intervals and stops after several idle polls or interrupt.
076   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
077   */
078  @Override
079  public void process(
080      PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig config,
081      PosterConfig.DecodeMode decodeMode,
082      PosterOutputPort outputPort) throws Exception {
083    Objects.requireNonNull(config, "config");
084    Objects.requireNonNull(outputPort, "outputPort");
085    String topic = config.kafkaInputTopic()
086        .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("tn kafka input topic required"));
087
088    try (Consumer<String, String> consumer = consumerSupplier.get()) {
089      consumer.subscribe(List.of(topic));
090      int idlePolls = 0;
091      final int maxIdlePolls = 10;
092      while (!Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {
093        ConsumerRecords<String, String> records = consumer.poll(Duration.ofMillis(500));
094        if (records.isEmpty()) {
095          if (++idlePolls >= maxIdlePolls) {
096            break;
097          }
098          continue;
099        }
100        idlePolls = 0;
101        for (ConsumerRecord<String, String> record : records) {
102          TnPair pair = parsePair(record.value());
103          if (pair == null) {
104            continue;
105          }
106          String content = formatPair(pair);
107          long ts = pair.startTs > 0 ? pair.startTs : pair.endTs;
108          outputPort.write(new PosterReport(ProtocolId.TN3270, pair.txId, ts, content));
109        }
110      }
111    }
112  }
113
114  private Consumer<String, String> createConsumer() {
115    Properties props = new Properties();
116    props.put(ConsumerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG, bootstrapServers);
117    props.put(ConsumerConfig.KEY_DESERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringDeserializer.class.getName());
118    props.put(ConsumerConfig.VALUE_DESERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringDeserializer.class.getName());
119    props.put(ConsumerConfig.GROUP_ID_CONFIG, "radar-poster-tn-" + UUID.randomUUID());
120    props.put(ConsumerConfig.AUTO_OFFSET_RESET_CONFIG, "earliest");
121    props.put(ConsumerConfig.ENABLE_AUTO_COMMIT_CONFIG, "true");
122    return new KafkaConsumer<>(props);
123  }
124
125  private static TnPair parsePair(String json) {
126    if (json == null || json.isBlank()) {
127      return null;
128    }
129    try {
130      String txId = extractString(json, "txId");
131      long startTs = extractLong(json, "startTs", 0L);
132      long endTs = extractLong(json, "endTs", 0L);
133      Endpoint client = parseEndpoint(extractObject(json, "client"));
134      Endpoint server = parseEndpoint(extractObject(json, "server"));
135      BinaryMessage request = parseBinaryMessage(extractObject(json, "request"));
136      BinaryMessage response = parseBinaryMessage(extractObject(json, "response"));
137      return new TnPair(txId, startTs, endTs, client, server, request, response);
138    } catch (Exception ex) {
139      return null;
140    }
141  }
142
143  private static BinaryMessage parseBinaryMessage(String json) {
144    if (json == null || json.isBlank() || json.equals("null")) {
145      return null;
146    }
147    long timestamp = extractLong(json, "timestamp", 0L);
148    int length = (int) extractLong(json, "length", 0L);
149    String bodyB64 = extractString(json, "payloadB64");
150    byte[] payload = bodyB64.isEmpty() ? new byte[0] : Base64.getDecoder().decode(bodyB64);
151    Map<String, String> attrs = parseAttributes(extractObject(json, "attributes"));
152    return new BinaryMessage(timestamp, length, payload, attrs);
153  }
154
155  private static Map<String, String> parseAttributes(String json) {
156    Map<String, String> map = new LinkedHashMap<>();
157    if (json == null || json.length() < 2) {
158      return map;
159    }
160    int idx = 0;
161    while (idx < json.length()) {
162      int keyStart = json.indexOf('"', idx);
163      if (keyStart < 0) {
164        break;
165      }
166      int keyEnd = findStringEnd(json, keyStart + 1);
167      if (keyEnd < 0) {
168        break;
169      }
170      String key = unescape(json.substring(keyStart + 1, keyEnd));
171      int colon = json.indexOf(':', keyEnd);
172      if (colon < 0) {
173        break;
174      }
175      int valueStart = json.indexOf('"', colon);
176      if (valueStart < 0) {
177        break;
178      }
179      int valueEnd = findStringEnd(json, valueStart + 1);
180      if (valueEnd < 0) {
181        break;
182      }
183      String value = unescape(json.substring(valueStart + 1, valueEnd));
184      map.put(key, value);
185      idx = valueEnd + 1;
186    }
187    return map;
188  }
189
190  private static Endpoint parseEndpoint(String json) {
191    if (json == null || json.isBlank()) {
192      return new Endpoint("0.0.0.0", 0);
193    }
194    String ip = extractString(json, "ip");
195    int port = (int) extractLong(json, "port", 0L);
196    return new Endpoint(ip, port);
197  }
198
199  private static String formatPair(TnPair pair) {
200    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(1024);
201    sb.append("=== TN3270 REQUEST ===\n");
202    if (pair.request != null) {
203      appendBinarySection(sb, pair.client, pair.server, true, pair.request);
204    } else {
205      sb.append("(no request captured)\n");
206    }
207    sb.append('\n');
208    sb.append("=== TN3270 RESPONSE ===\n");
209    if (pair.response != null) {
210      appendBinarySection(sb, pair.client, pair.server, false, pair.response);
211    } else {
212      sb.append("(no response captured)\n");
213    }
214    return sb.toString();
215  }
216
217  private static void appendBinarySection(
218      StringBuilder sb,
219      Endpoint client,
220      Endpoint server,
221      boolean request,
222      BinaryMessage message) {
223    Endpoint src = request ? client : server;
224    Endpoint dst = request ? server : client;
225    sb.append("# timestamp_us: ").append(message.timestamp).append('\n');
226    sb.append("# src: ").append(src.ip).append(':').append(src.port).append('\n');
227    sb.append("# dst: ").append(dst.ip).append(':').append(dst.port).append('\n');
228    if (!message.attributes.isEmpty()) {
229      sb.append("# attrs: ");
230      boolean first = true;
231      for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : message.attributes.entrySet()) {
232        if (!first) {
233          sb.append(", ");
234        }
235        sb.append(entry.getKey()).append('=').append(entry.getValue());
236        first = false;
237      }
238      sb.append('\n');
239    }
240    sb.append('\n');
241    if (message.payload.length == 0) {
242      sb.append("(empty payload)\n");
243    } else {
244      sb.append(hexDump(message.payload));
245    }
246  }
247
248  private static String extractObject(String json, String key) {
249    String token = '"' + key + '"' + ":";
250    int idx = json.indexOf(token);
251    if (idx < 0) {
252      return null;
253    }
254    int braceStart = json.indexOf('{', idx + token.length());
255    if (braceStart < 0) {
256      int nullStart = json.indexOf("null", idx + token.length());
257      if (nullStart == idx + token.length()) {
258        return "null";
259      }
260      return null;
261    }
262    int depth = 0;
263    for (int i = braceStart; i < json.length(); i++) {
264      char c = json.charAt(i);
265      if (c == '{') {
266        depth++;
267      } else if (c == '}') {
268        depth--;
269        if (depth == 0) {
270          return json.substring(braceStart, i + 1);
271        }
272      }
273    }
274    return null;
275  }
276
277  private static String extractString(String json, String key) {
278    String token = '"' + key + '"' + ":";
279    int idx = json.indexOf(token);
280    if (idx < 0) {
281      return "";
282    }
283    int startQuote = json.indexOf('"', idx + token.length());
284    if (startQuote < 0) {
285      return "";
286    }
287    int endQuote = findStringEnd(json, startQuote + 1);
288    if (endQuote < 0) {
289      return "";
290    }
291    return unescape(json.substring(startQuote + 1, endQuote));
292  }
293
294  private static long extractLong(String json, String key, long defaultValue) {
295    String token = '"' + key + '"' + ":";
296    int idx = json.indexOf(token);
297    if (idx < 0) {
298      return defaultValue;
299    }
300    int start = idx + token.length();
301    int end = start;
302    while (end < json.length() && (json.charAt(end) == '-' || Character.isDigit(json.charAt(end)))) {
303      end++;
304    }
305    if (end == start) {
306      return defaultValue;
307    }
308    try {
309      return Long.parseLong(json.substring(start, end));
310    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
311      return defaultValue;
312    }
313  }
314
315  private static int findStringEnd(String json, int start) {
316    boolean escaping = false;
317    for (int i = start; i < json.length(); i++) {
318      char c = json.charAt(i);
319      if (escaping) {
320        escaping = false;
321        continue;
322      }
323      if (c == '\\') {
324        escaping = true;
325        continue;
326      }
327      if (c == '"') {
328        return i;
329      }
330    }
331    return -1;
332  }
333
334  private static String unescape(String value) {
335    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(value.length());
336    boolean escaping = false;
337    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
338      char c = value.charAt(i);
339      if (escaping) {
340        switch (c) {
341          case '"' -> sb.append('"');
342          case '\\' -> sb.append('\\');
343          case 'n' -> sb.append('\n');
344          case 'r' -> sb.append('\r');
345          case 't' -> sb.append('\t');
346          default -> sb.append(c);
347        }
348        escaping = false;
349      } else if (c == '\\') {
350        escaping = true;
351      } else {
352        sb.append(c);
353      }
354    }
355    if (escaping) {
356      sb.append('\\');
357    }
358    return sb.toString();
359  }
360
361  private static String hexDump(byte[] data) {
362    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(data.length * 3);
363    for (int i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
364      if (i > 0 && (i % 16) == 0) {
365        sb.append('\n');
366      }
367      int b = data[i] & 0xFF;
368      sb.append(Character.forDigit((b >>> 4) & 0xF, 16));
369      sb.append(Character.forDigit(b & 0xF, 16));
370      sb.append(' ');
371    }
372    return sb.toString().trim();
373  }
374
375  private record Endpoint(String ip, int port) {}
376
377  private record BinaryMessage(long timestamp, int length, byte[] payload, Map<String, String> attributes) {
378    BinaryMessage {
379      payload = payload != null ? payload : new byte[0];
380      attributes = attributes != null ? attributes : Map.of();
381    }
382  }
383
384  private record TnPair(
385      String txId,
386      long startTs,
387      long endTs,
388      Endpoint client,
389      Endpoint server,
390      BinaryMessage request,
391      BinaryMessage response) {}
392}
